amendment.description: Amendment requires an annual report on countries where United States goods or services do not have market access.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 12 printed in the Congressional Record. to require an annual report on countries where United States goods or services do not have market access.

action.text: Traficant amendment (A011) modified by unanimous consent. The modification makes technical changes.
On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
